DOC.brief_summary: This single arm study will assess the safety of MabThera plus methotrexate in patients with rheumatoid arthritis who have had a lack of response to 1-5 DMARDs or biological agents. Patients will receive MabThera (1g i.v.) on days 1 and 15, concomitantly with methotrexate >=15mg p.o./week. The anticipated time on study treatment is 3-12 months, and the target sample size is 100-500 individuals.
DOC.brief_title: A Non-Comparative Study to Assess the Safety of MabThera (Rituximab) in Patients With Rheumatoid Arthritis.
DOC.criteria: adult patients, >=18 years of age; rheumatoid arthritis >=6 months; lack of response to 15 DMARDs or biological agents; rheumatoid factor positive. other chronic inflammatory articular disease or systemic rheumatic disease; joint or bone surgery during 8 weeks prior to randomization; previous treatment with any celldepleting therapy.
